column4: Anyone here know how to change file association for SD cards?  I don't want to use fspot.
This is kinda frustrating something so simple in kde, is impossible in gnome.  I can do all sorts of fun stuff when a drive is connected in kde no problem.
what are you truing to do with a drive on gnome that you can't ?
I'm just trying to get a custom script to run whenever I insert an sd card.  Just can't seem to figure it out.  I've looked all over the place.
